title: Cap Stone Project
subtitle: Design 4
overview: Developed a prototype wireless sensor network to manage inventory management
Scalable wireless sensor network using radio and MQTT to communicate with server
Near real time communication with MQTT and web sockets
responsibilities: Sheet metal design with Solid Works

title: Analog To Digital Converter (ADC)
subtitle: Micro and Nano Scale Electronics
overview: Successive Approximation Register (Binary Search Tree Algorithm)
Components: Sample and Hold, Comparator, OP-Amp, SAR, and DAC
9Mhz operating frequency

title: RFID based Segregation System in Material Recovery Facilities for Beverage Cartons
subtitle: Design 3
overview: Theoretical project to reduce the residual waste at the Guelph recovery facility by designing an autonomous system that would complement the existing processes
Project involved extensive Research, Design, and Technical/Cost Analysis
Final Proposed solution was a real time system with an RFID CNC pickup machine

title: Remote Hydroponics Project
subtitle: Wireless Sensor Networks
overview: Design and Developed a system with an arduino and raspberry pi to remotely monitor and manage a miniature hydroponics farm
Measured temperature and ambient humidity, set up a camera to take photos to monitor plant growth
Used relays to control the pump and lights for the system
Raspberry Pi was used as a web server with MEAN stack
Arduino was responsible with sensors and relays
Communication Used: HTTP, Websockets, MQTT, Wifi

title: Caremunity Android App Backend Project
subtitle: System Analysis and Design in Applications
overview: Worked on a team of four to design and create a backend service for Android app to help people with FASD take medications.
Created backend service using Node.js, Postman, and MySQL to fulfill requirements.
Worked with clients through product development with paper prototyping and wire-framing.

title: MIPS Processor (VHDL)
subtitle: Computer Organization and Design
overview: 16-bit Mips processor with 8 switches, 7 segmentment display, and 14 instructions
Successfully implemented fibonacci variant instruction in assembly and MIPS

title: iCal Database Project
subtitle: Software System Development and Integration
overview: Demonstrated sound time management skills while working on a four-stage project (parser utility library, command line extension, Python GUI, MySQL database).
Overcame barriers from tight timelines, debugging, fixing bugs in lengthy programs, and learning Python and MySQL
Worked with various features, including I/O, C to Python extensions, and server functionality
Used Tkinter to create Python GUI.
